admission_requirements.summary: This text appears to be a navigational menu or a list of links related to university admissions and information. It includes options for applying for CUET counselling, details on the admission process, courses and fee structures, scholarships, loans, transport, and hostels. Additionally, it lists admission alerts, contact information for the admission and outreach team, PhD admissions, a domestic brochure for Indian students, and a prospectus. It also contains a general "Apply Now 2025" link.
